pr_title: Fix Drag and Drop on empty database

timeline.message: Fix Drag and Drop on empty database

timeline.bodyText: I think the similar code for the tabHeaderArea below can now be removed, since this is handled on the scene level. Right?
timeline.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText: Yes you are right, I have deleted the unnecessary code.
replies.author: MootezSaaD

timeline.message: Add changelog entry and remove unnecessary code

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - We fixed an issue where drag and drop was not working on empty database. []()
          
          
            
            - We fixed an issue where drag and drop was not working on empty database. [#6487](https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/issues/6487)
timeline.author: Siedlerchr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -69,6 +69,7 @@ Note that this project **does not** adhere to [Semantic Versioning](http://semve
 - We fixed an issue where the library sort order was lost. [#6091](https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/issues/6091)
 - We fixed an issue where brackets in regular expressions were not working. [6469](https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/pull/6469)
 - We fixed an issue where LaTeX citations for specific commands (\autocites) of biblatex-mla were not recognized. [#6476](https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/issues/6476)
+- We fixed an issue where drag and drop was not working on empty database. []()
